job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: ltpgtSanas is building a worldfirst realtime accent conversion platform We have developed a solution with the help of the minds behind Shazam Siri and Nuance Our first deployment horizon is centered on customer service centers to increase customer satisfaction and decrease averagehandling time training costs and turnover With our solution accent conversion can be done in realtime resulting in increased understanding and decreased customer service costsltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtWe are a 15person company founded in 2020 We have already signed contracts worth tens of millions of dollars and are backed by Human Capital General Catalyst Quiet Capital and DN CapitalltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtWith all the growth we are looking for someone to join our machine learning RampampD team The role will involve close work with the top cited Machine Learning Researchers in the voice conversion space as well as access to massive speech datasetsltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtMust haveltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtBS or MS in computer science engineering or other technical degreesltligtltligtHave 1 years of industry experience or 3 years of research experienceltligtltligtHave experience working in an industry relevant to Speech and LanguageltligtltligtYou are familiar with Pytorch Tensorflow BashltligtltulgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtNice to haveltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtComfortable communicating information to executive and senior stakeholdersltligtltligtExcited to work in a fastpaced environmentltligtltligtPassionate about their work take ownership and deliver resultsltligtltligtYou proactively identify problems and opportunities and generate creative approaches to solve themltligtltligtYou understand that celebrating accomplishments is just as important as looking for ways to improveltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgt
